job_tasks.phrase: identificeren, ontwerpen en implementeren van technische oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities related to building and deploying solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: data gestructureerd, veilig en direct toegankelijk voor analyse en productontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of data engineering work, implying data preparation, organization, and accessibility for downstream use.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen
job_tasks.justification: This task directly refers to the process of creating, training, or adapting machine learning models, specifically language models.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the creation and management of data pipelines, a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten.
job_tasks.justification: This involves the design and integration of technical solutions into existing product frameworks.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on enhancing data quality and processing efficiency, key aspects of data management and engineering.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a proactive and creative approach to problem-solving and development.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met zowel Technische Platform Teams als Digital Product Teams
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Bieden van technische ondersteuning en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie
soft_skills.justification: This describes sharing knowledge and providing support, which falls under communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job description includes a significant number of tasks related to data engineering and management (1.B.3) and model development/optimization for language models (1.B.1), which fall under Macro-Category B and are focused on Generative AI. It also includes some core software engineering tasks (1.A.1) related to integrating solutions. With 4 tasks in Macro-Category B and 2 in Macro-Category A, the role is predominantly focused on Generative AI tasks, fitting the GenAI Specialist profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear, detailed, and directly maps to the defined categories, particularly highlighting the focus on language models and data engineering.
